processingCommand.script:
! Restart modules
:SET &WMS_RESTART#       = "false"
:SET &REFS_RESTART#      = "false"
:SET &RW_RESTART#        = "false"
:SET &EMS_RESTART#       = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_RESTART#  = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_RESTART# = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_RESTART#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_RESTART#  = "false"


:IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &TGT_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:    SET &WMS_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:  IF &TGT_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:    SET &WMS_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &TGT_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:    SET &REFS_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:  IF &TGT_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:    SET &REFS_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &TGT_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:    SET &RW_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:  IF &TGT_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:    SET &RW_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &TGT_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:    SET &EMS_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:  IF &TGT_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:    SET &EMS_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &TGT_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:    SET &WMS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:  IF &TGT_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:    SET &WMS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &TGT_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:    SET &REFS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:  IF &TGT_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:    SET &REFS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &TGT_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:    SET &RW_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:  IF &TGT_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:    SET &RW_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &TGT_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:    SET &EMS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:  IF &TGT_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:    SET &EMS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF


:IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = "EMPTY"
:  SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &SRC_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = "EMPTY"
:  SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &SRC_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = "EMPTY"
:  SET &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &SRC_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = "EMPTY"
:  SET &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &SRC_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = "EMPTY"
:  SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &SRC_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = "EMPTY"
:  SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &SRC_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = "EMPTY"
:  SET &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &SRC_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = "EMPTY"
:  SET &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &SRC_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &WMS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
